trans-unit.resname: J16·1 | Stoneforge Mystic | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stoneforge Mystic
trans-unit.target: Stoneforge Mystic

trans-unit.resname: J16·1 | Stoneforge Mystic | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: J16·1 | Stoneforge Mystic | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.
